This challenge just requires us to get the correct flag so we can use a just a debugger. Inside the main function there is a variable initialized with the value â€œFK?DwObbkJ^di_V?_c0R4L\Meâ€. Giving that value as input to the program and looking at the CPU registers will show us â€œAG{ThisShouldNotBeHard}â€. For some reason the flag is cut off, but giving â€œFLAG{ThisShouldNotBeHard}â€ as the input will show us a success message.

Have a great day :) github.com/johnnnthan
